name: Battle of Giants: Dragons
description:
Would you use your power and strategy to defeat the SALMU dragons and
bring back peace into the world to TAMMABUKKU?

Features

• Explore the world of dragons - TAMMABUKU
• Create your unique
dragon, explore and fight to restore peace in the world of dragons!
•
Hunt and defeat the SALMU dragons to win back treasures, the source of
our powers.
• Restore the peace to TAMMABUKU!
